Russia's FSB says it shoots dead a man planning an 'act of terrorism' - RIARussia's Federal Security Service (FSB) said on Thursday that it had shot dead a Belarusian man who had been planning "an act of terrorism" on behalf of Ukraine in the northern Russian region of Karelia, the RIA state news agency reported. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 10:03:59 GMT F6FUC6A2JBLYTCD3DLZJF43C3U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-fsb-says-it-shoots-dead-man-planning-an-act-恐怖主义-ria-2024-03-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Turkish opposition disarray lifts Erdogan's hopes of winning back IstanbulDisunity among Turkey's opposition parties has boosted President Tayyip Erdogan's hopes that his AK Party can regain control of Istanbul in this month's municipal elections, pollsters say, following his victory in last year's presidential vote. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 09:55:51 GMT IVJE2V5DSJJTHBXH7Z6TAFQ5WE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkish-opposition-disarray-lifts-erdogan-hopes-wining-back-istanbul-2024-03-07/Birsen Altayli世界中东地区
Thai customs seize red panda, snakes in checked-in baggageThai customs officials rescued a red panda, snakes, monkeys and chameleons from checked-in luggage at the country's main airport this week after arresting six Indian nationals for attempted smuggling. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 09:52:45 GMT IKAJBJ2QKZP3XP74Y73TOEUMGA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thai-customs-seize-red-panda-snakes-checked-in-baggage-2024-03-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
Czech farmers dump manure on Prague streets in renewed protestsCzech farmers dumped manure in front of government offices and blocked Prague streets with tractors on Thursday as they renewed their demands for more support, less bureaucracy and a halt to cheap imports to the European Union. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 09:49:05 GMT WYWNDOBDRZMEVWBYWVULNURGE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/czech-farmers-dump-manure-prague-streets-renewed-protests-2024-03-07/Reuters世界欧洲
Hong Kong to submit new national security bill to legislature this weekThe Hong Kong government said in a statement on Thursday it would gazette the "Article 23" national security bill and submit it to the local legislature for scrutiny on Friday. Israel should be dropped from Eurovision if Gaza war continues, say Belgian ministersTwo Belgian ministers have called for Israel's exclusion from the Eurovision Song Contest while the Gaza war is ongoing as a punitive measure for the toll on Palestinian civilians. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 08:57:58 GMT VENZI4ITWZNEZHZZQNJOERA53E https://www.reuters.com/world/israel-should-be-dropped-eurovision-if-gaza-war-continues-say-belgian-ministers-2024-03-07/Charlotte Van Campenhout世界
Bleak Women's Day for mothers whose daughters are still hostages in GazaSimona Steinbrecher holds up two images of her daughter, Doron. One shows a young woman with twinkling eyes and a big smile. The other, from a video distributed by Hamas 107 days into the war, shows an emaciated, pale woman, with an almost lifeless gaze. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 08:45:15 GMT 2G6Z3XLQP5K4TDDRON727I27XE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/fight-life-by-mothers-whose-daughters-are-still-hostages-in-gaza-2024-03-07/Maayan Lubell, Janis Laizans世界中东地区
Trying to contain China will only fuel its grievances, says Malaysian PMAttempts to contain China's rise would only aggravate the country and sow discord in the region, Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said during a speech in Australia on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 07:38:46 GMT PGGDQLHQRZIKZLRYBJUBITW7DM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/trying-to-contain-china-will-only-fuel-its-grievances-says-malaysian-pm-2024-03-07/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Israeli tank in 'likely scenario' fired machine gun at reporters after deadly shelling, report findsAn Israeli tank crew killed a Reuters reporter in Lebanon in October by firing two shells at a clearly identified group of journalists and then "likely" opened fire on them with a heavy machine gun in an attack that lasted 1 minute and 45 seconds, according to a report into the incident published on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 07:02:28 GMT GYTDN57EORP6ZBMOVDOE32健康https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-tank-likely-scenario-fired-machine-gun-reporters-after-deadly-shelling-2024-03-07/Maya Gebeily, Anthony Deutsch世界中东地区
